artist: Artist: Veronika Schäpers; Artist: Shimizu Yoshinori
description: black cardboard box with white cover; Japanese title in pink overlapping a black and white picture of a young boy and girl sitting shoulder to shoulder, touching foreheads; Nonsensical English text in background; on back, same black and white photograph is blown up much larger with English title in pink; contains black cardboard folder with CD; gray softcover book with English and Japanese text on gridded, decorated paper; contains supplementary materials--photocopies of original lesson: yellow pages with very simle English sentences, samples of English cursive, and drawings of male and female; lender's archive #207
markings: Numbered in pencil on colophon page: 28
medium: Linocut; letterpress; compact disc; with commercial notebook cover
provenance: William P. Kosmas, London, England (d. 2017); Estate of William P. Kosmas, Minneapolis; given to MIA, 2018.
signed: Signed in pencil on colophon page: Veronika Schäpers
title: Jack and Betty Forever (English and Japanese)
